column1: We at Compunnel Technology is hiring For a Presales Analyst | WFH
column2: We at Compunnel Technology is hiring for a Presales Analyst Job Title:  Presales Analyst Work Mode:  Work from Home Shift Timing:  01:00 PM. to 10:00 PM Job Description: The Presales Analyst plays a crucial role in supporting the federal sales team by providing technical expertise, solution design, and compelling demonstrations for cloud solutions, cybersecurity solutions, AI/ML solutions, and/or data solutions. This role collaborates with the sales team, technical experts, and proposal writers to develop solutions that address federal agency requirements. Role and Responsibilities: Technical Discovery:  Conduct in-depth needs assessments with potential clients to understand their pain points, technical requirements, and desired outcomes. Solution Design:  Develop and tailor technical solutions that align with client needs,      leveraging cloud, cybersecurity, AI/ML, and data capabilities. Create architecture diagrams and solution overviews. RFP Support:  Collaborate with the proposal team to provide technical input, and solution descriptions, and ensure accurate representation of capabilities in responses to RFPs/RFQs. Competitive Analysis:  Stay informed about market trends, competitor offerings, and emerging technologies relevant to the federal cloud, cybersecurity, AI/ML, and data sectors. Qualification: Technical Background:  Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field or equivalent experience. Cloud Expertise:  Experience with one or more major cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP), and an understanding of cloud architectures, migration strategies, and cloud security. Cybersecurity Understanding:  Knowledge of cybersecurity principles, threat vectors, and compliance standards relevant to the federal space (e.g., FISMA, NIST 800-53). AI/ML and Data Familiarity:  Basic understanding of AI/ML concepts, use cases, and data analytics relevant to federal needs. Prior Experience:  3-5 years of experience in presales, technical consulting, and/or solution design, preferably with exposure to the federal market. Excellent Communication:  Strong written and verbal communication skills, tailoring technical concepts for a government audience. Interested candidates can share their updated profile at Ritiz.raj@compunnel.com About Compunnel: Compunnel, a business tenure of 28 years, A Great Place To Work Certified Incorporation, with a distinction of 7-time Inc. 5000 honoree, SIA reported one of largest Staffing Firms in the US and Microsoft Gold Certified has marked 200 Million in revenue with a wide network of 5000 Consultants, 500 employees with 10 offices in North America, 5 offices and the delivery centers across India. Compunnel is identified with 300+ placements in a month with Fortune 500 and Inc. 1000 companies to a math of 2000+ active clients, serving with 100s of regular and emerging skills in IT, Engineering, Professional and healthcare. We are self-reliant with our own competitive products in the talent landscape like Staffline Pro, Staff-line ATS, iEndourseU, Jobhuk, NurseDeck and Will-hire and have taken over and incorporated many staffing firms. We also have a specialized team of support functions, Legal, Onboarding, and Immigration. Thanks & Regards,

At DenDecors.in, our mission is to curate an unparalleled selection of high-quality home furnishing products and provide personalized interior design services that exceed our customers' expectations. column2: Company Description:  LivNest is a technology-based real estate consultancy firm that provides a range of real estate consultancy services to individuals, families, investors, and businesses. Our team of experienced and knowledgeable professionals has an in-depth understanding of the market and the regulatory environment, enabling us to provide accurate and relevant information to our clients at all times. Our services include property sale, property management, and valuation.  The key responsible areas of a Sales Manager: ??Prospecting and Lead Generation: Identifying potential clients and generating leads through various channels such as networking, referrals, and cold calling.  ??Client Relationship Building: Establishing rapport with clients, understanding their needs and preferences, and providing personalized assistance throughout the sales process.  ??Property Presentation: Showcasing properties to clients, highlighting features and benefits, and addressing any inquiries or concerns they may have.  ??Negotiation: Negotiating terms and prices with clients and property owners to facilitate successful transactions.  ??Sales Closure: Closing deals by guiding clients through the purchase or rental process, handling paperwork, and ensuring smooth transactions.  ??Market Research: Keeping abreast of market trends, property values, and competitor activities to provide accurate and relevant information to clients.  ??Follow-up: Following up with clients to ensure satisfaction, address any issues, and nurture long-term relationships for repeat business and referrals. ??Collaboration: Collaborating with other team members, such as marketing professionals and property managers, to support sales efforts and achieve common goals.  ??Continuous Learning: Staying updated on industry regulations, market dynamics, and sales techniques through training programs, workshops, and self-study.   Desired Candidate Profile:   ??Sales Experience: Prior experience in sales, preferably in real estate or a related field, demonstrating the ability to meet or exceed sales targets.  ??Communication Skills: Strong verbal and written communication skills to effectively interact with clients, understand their needs, and present solutions.  ??Negotiation Skills: Ability to negotiate terms and close deals effectively while maintaining positive relationships with clients.  ??Market Knowledge: Understanding of the local real estate market, including current trends, property values, and competition.  ??Customer Relationship Management (CRM): Experience using CRM software to manage leads, track interactions, and follow up with clients.  ??Networking Abilities: Proven ability to build and maintain a network of contacts within the real estate industry, including clients, developers, and other professionals.  ??Self-Motivation: High level of self-motivation and initiative to generate leads, pursue opportunities, and drive results independently.  ??Adaptability: Ability to adapt to changing market conditions, client needs, and company strategies.   ??Professional Appearance: Presentable appearance and demeanor suitable for client-facing interactions.  ??Drive for Results: Demonstrated track record of achieving sales targets and delivering results in a competitive environment.

Provide technical guidance and solutions that      align with the client's needs and demonstrating how our products/services      address their pain points. column2: Job Synopsis:: As a Pre-Sales Consultant specialising in software services and solutions, you will play a crucial role in driving the growth and success of our business. You will be the key interface between our clients and the technical team, showcasing our services, understanding client needs, and crafting tailored solutions. If you are passionate about technology, enjoy engaging with clients, and have a knack for translating technical concepts into compelling business propositions, this role is for you. Responsibilities: Client Engagements: Collaborate with the sales and technical teams to understand client requirements and business objectives. Conduct client meetings and presentations to communicate the value proposition of our services. Act as a trusted advisor, building strong client relationships. Solution Crafting: Work closely with the technical team to design and propose innovative solutions that meet client needs. Prepare and deliver compelling proposals, presentations, and product demonstrations. Market Analysis: Stay updated on industry trends, competitors, and emerging technologies. Conduct market research to identify new business opportunities. Crafting Excellence in Documents: Compose and refine various documents, including proposals, contracts, and business plans. Ensure each document resonates with client needs, adheres to industry standards, and showcases our services uniquely. Technical Acumen : Develop a deep understanding of our services and solutions. Translate technical features into clear and compelling benefits for clients. Requirements : Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Business, Marketing, or a related field. Proven experience in a pre-sales or similar role within the software services industry. Strong communication and presentation skills. Exceptional document drafting skills, covering proposals, contracts, and business plans Technical background with the ability to understand and convey complex technical concepts. Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams. Excellent organizational and time-management skills.

column2: Engage with prospective clients globally over the phone and email, so your communication and presentation skills mean the world to us. On occasions where the rapport with the client leads to meeting them in person, you should be ready to make the most out of the opportunity. Basic knowledge of business cultures will help, this is where we want wit and sales expertise to dominate the scene, we will train you in all you need to perform and grow in the organization.     Extensive travel will be required, domestically within India and outside within APAC, Europe and the USA on a need basis.     Ability to tailor the solutions to every clients context with support from the respective teams, be ready to lead or be led going by whats best for a transaction, challenge the status-quo with compelling alternatives and be committed to go the distance to win.     Customer Satisfaction is the most important factor in this role, and we see a customer relationship expert in you as much as we see a sales professional. You have to build long term relationships with existing and new clients.     Ability to negotiate will be key to up-sell and cross-sell, while we can give you all the differentiators we have technologically and commercially we want you to leverage your ability to negotiate and create a win-win outcome.     We are running against time for a variety of reasons, we can explain them all to you, we need you to be time sensitive, punctual and drive things ahead of time whenever possible.     An under-grad or a Masters degree holder in subjects related to technology, sales, marketing, business management and/or economics.     Base location is Hyderabad (preferably) with travel within and outside of India.     We are looking at someone with 6-7 years of relevant experience and we will pay on par with the market conditions today, in addition to which we will have incentives.

column2: The Unified Collaboration Presales Architect is a mid/senior-level position responsible for designing and proposing comprehensive UCaaS/CCaaS solutions to prospective clients.   This role demands deep expertise in Unified Collaboration Full stack ( On prem / Cloud Calling and Contact Center ) and a strong understanding of enterprise ( Large and SMB Customer ) business requirements.   The primary goal is to work closely with the sales team to develop winning proposals ( Proactive Pursuits and RFXs ) and drive business growth ( Hunting and Farming )       Key Responsibilities:         Client Engagement:       Collaborate with the sales team to engage with potential clients and understand their specific networking solution needs.     Conduct in-depth discussions to gather requirements and assess the clients current infrastructure.           Solution Design:       Develop customized network and unified communication solutions that align with the clients requirements and business objectives.     Create detailed architectural designs and proposals that address the clients technical and business needs.           Technical Expertise:       Demonstrate in-depth knowledge of networking technologies, including routers, switches, firewalls, load balancers, and VPNs.     Exhibit expertise in Collaboration solutions, including Cloud calling and Contact Center ( Cisco /Webex/ AWS / MS ) , and monitoring & manage tools.     AI Ops , Analytics , Lifecycle management hands experience ( Assess Design Deploy Operate Migrate Consulting )     Communication solutions ( Enterprise and Communication provider - SIPTaaS , ClientaaS , AI-Voice , CCaaS, UCaaS )     Standardize service Offers ( Rinse and repeat model ) and automate the service proposals , pricing models across customer segments.           Cost Estimation:       Provide accurate cost estimates for proposed solutions, considering hardware, software, licensing, integrations , services, and implementation costs.     Managed and Professional services models (standard and Volume based )           Presentation and Documentation:       Prepare and deliver compelling presentations to clients that articulate the benefits and technical aspects of the proposed solutions.     Create detailed documentation, including network diagrams and solution architecture, to support proposals.           Collaboration:       Assist the sales team to strategize and tailor proposals to meet client expectations and competitive market conditions.     Collaborate with product and technical teams to ensure the proposed solutions align with company strategy , available resources, and capabilities.           SWOT Analysis:       Stay up to date with industry trends and emerging technologies in network services.     Use market insights to provide innovative and competitive solutions.     Deal Analysis           Qualifications and Skills:       Bachelors degree in computer science, information technology, or a related field.     8 + years of experience in UCaaS/ CCaaS design, architecture, and unified communication.     Industry certifications (e.g., Cisco CCIE ( Webex/ Collab ) , AWS Amazon Connect, or equivalent are highly desirable.     Proficiency in designing solutions involving Cisco, Amazon, or other major networking equipment.     Strong knowledge of unified communication platforms such as Cisco Unified Communications, Amazon, Microsoft Teams, or similar.     Excellent communication and presentation skills.     Demonstrated ability to work in a fast-paced, customer-focused environment.     Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.     Business acumen ( Primary US Geo business / Clients) and the ability to understand and address client needs.

column2: As an AV Design Engineer and AV Presales professional, you will be responsible for designing and architecting audio-visual (AV) solutions and providing pre-sales support to clients      You will work closely with sales teams, customers, and project managers to understand client requirements and develop innovative AV designs that meet their needs      Additionally, you will provide technical expertise during the pre-sales process, including product demonstrations, system configurations, and customer consultations      This role requires a strong technical background in AV technology, excellent communication skills, and the ability to work collaboratively in a dynamic environment                         Responsibilities:                  AV Solution Design:                v            Collaborate with clients, sales teams, and project managers to gather requirements and understand project goals.              v            Design and engineer comprehensive AV solutions that align with client needs, budget, and industry standards.              v            Create detailed AV system diagrams, equipment lists, and installation plans.              v            Conduct feasibility studies and provide recommendations for AV technologies and equipment.              Pre-sales Support:                v            Assist sales teams with technical expertise during the pre-sales process.              v            Conduct product demonstrations and presentations to showcase AV capabilities and features.              v            Collaborate with clients to understand their AV requirements and provide consultative guidance.              v            Develop system configurations, quotes, and proposals based on client specifications.              Technical Consultation:                v            Provide technical advice and guidance to clients regarding AV technologies, standards, and best practices.              v            Conduct site visits and assess existing AV infrastructure for integration and compatibility.              v            Collaborate with internal teams to address technical queries and provide solutions to client concerns.              Project Collaboration:                v            Work closely with project managers and installation teams to ensure successful execution of AV designs.              v            Provide input and support during the project planning and implementation stages.              v            Collaborate with external vendors and suppliers to source AV equipment and ensure timely delivery.                        Industry Knowledge:              Stay up-to-date with the latest AV technologies, trends, and industry standards. Attend industry conferences, seminars, and training sessions to enhance professional knowledge. Share insights and knowledge with colleagues and contribute to the development of best practices.                Requirements:                  v            Bachelors degree in Electronics, Electrical & Computer Science Engineering              v            Proven experience in AV design engineering and pre-sales support.              v            Strong knowledge of audio-visual technologies, including audio systems, video conferencing, digital signage, control systems, and networked AV solutions.              v            Proficiency in CAD software for designing AV system diagrams.              v            Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to effectively convey technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.              v            Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting abilities.              v            Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.              v            Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality solutions. column2: Pre Sales Specia;ist We are seeking a highly motivated and dynamic individual to join our team. As a Pre Sales - Specialist, you will play a crucial role in our sales process by providing technical expertise and support to our sales team. You will be responsible for engaging with potential clients, understanding their business requirements, and presenting our products and solutions in a compelling manner. Your primary goal will be to assist the sales team in closing deals. About FieldAssist FieldAssist is a top-tier SaaS platform that specializes in optimizing Route-to-Market strategies and enhancing brand relationships within the CPG partner ecosystem. With over 1,00,000 sales users representing over 600+ CPG brands across 10+ countries in South East Asia, the Middle East, and Africa, we reach 10,000 distributors and 7.5 million retail outlets across GT and MT every day. Our goal is to equip sales teams, managers, distributors, sales heads, and CXOs with an all-in-one platform, enabling them to make informed decisions that drive growth. FieldAssist is a 'Proud Partner to Great Brands,' like Godrej Consumers, Saro Africa, Danone, Tolaram, Haldirams, Eureka Forbes, Bisleri, Nilons, Borosil, Adani Wilmar, Henkel, Jockey, Emami, Philips, Chings and Mamaearth among others. For one in the Seat: Responsibilities Collaborate with the sales team to identify and qualify potential leads and opportunities. Conduct thorough research and analysis of prospective clients' business needs, industry trends, and competitors' offerings. Prepare and deliver engaging presentations, demonstrations, and product overviews to potential clients, showcasing the value and benefits of our solutions. Gather and document client requirements, and provide feedback to the product development team to ensure continuous improvement of our offerings. Customize and tailor product demonstrations and proposals according to client needs, including responding to RFPs and RFIs. Collaborate with internal stakeholders, including product managers, engineers, and marketing teams, to customize and tailor product demonstrations and proposals according to client needs. Assist in the creation of sales collateral, including product datasheets, case studies, and technical documentation. Respond to technical inquiries and provide pre-sales technical support to potential clients. Conduct product trainings and workshops for the sales team to enhance their understanding of our offerings. Stay up-to-date with industry trends, technologies, and competitive landscape to effectively position our solutions in the market. Contribute to the development and refinement of the sales process, strategies, and best practices. Who we're looking for: 1Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. Minimum of 4 year of experience in a presales or similar role, preferably in the software industry. Strong technical aptitude and ability to understand and communicate complex technical concepts effectively. Excellent presentation and communication skills, both verbal and written.   WHAT   IT'S   LIKE   IN   THE   BUS   WITH   US Demonstrated ability to build and maintain relationships with clients and internal stakeholders. Self-motivated with a strong sense of ownership and accountability. Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively in a team environment. Proficiency in using CRM software and other sales enablement tools. Willingness to travel occasionally for client meetings, conferences, and industry events. Experience in mentoring/managing a small team Know You Leaders Divir Tiwari is the Co-founder and CEO, a graduate from Indian Institute of Technology, Dhanbad who loves to interact and apprehend concerns which have a potential to be resolved with new-age technology. In 2014, Divir co-founded FieldAssist, a part of Flick2Know. Driven to solve the most critical challenge of the CPG industry- mapping and monitoring field sales staff. Today, under his fine leadership, FieldAssist powers go-to- market strategies of over 600 CPG brands with tens of products and uncountable innovations in its portfolio. Chitransh   Jain  is the Chief Customer Officer at FieldAssist and is leading a team of over seventy. He started his journey as a Customer Success Manager and has succeeded to lead the entire department within five years of service. With over 200 executed projects, Chitransh is focused on helping leaders at CPG brands in driving automation in their organization, and building robust sales and distribution go-to-market strategies for their companies. The Team and Culture FieldAssist on the Web Website : https://www.fieldassist.com/people-philosophy-culture/ Culture   Book : https://www.fieldassist.com/fa-culture-book CEO's   Message : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bl_tM5E5hcw LinkedIn : https://www.linkedin.com/company/fieldassist/

column2: The Presales Embedded Tech Solution Architect will be responsible for supporting proactive and reactive proposal requirements forwarded by the North America sales team. This associate will be developing proposal response based on customer requirement for RFI / RFQ / RFS / RFP etc related to Embedded technologies, IoT etc. He / She will work closely with the sales team and customers in the process. This associate will own the proposal solution response end to end and develop the delivery model, engagement roadmap, transition and transformation approach, effort estimation etc. Also, as part of proposal development, this associate will be working with relevant technical SMEs for developing technical / transformation solution for the proposal, if needed. During the proposal preparation process, the associate will require to interact with customer / partner / TPAs in person or remotely.             Responsibilities       Main tasks include specifically:     Responding & devising Solutions for RFI/RFP/RFQs proposals    Devising a successful strategy for winning a bid, including proposing unique selling points/Differentiators, researching, writing and/or checking proposals   Working with key stakeholders/Point of Contacts involved from different project teams during the entire bid cycle and client organization to obtain the information required to compile the bid   Develop managed services and transformation solutions   Create commercials models and competitive bid pricing in alignment with internal and industry benchmarks   Perform business case analysis including hardware, hosting, licenses, people, and migration cost to exhibit tangible benefits   Participate in customer and TPA discussions   Keep upskilling knowledge on technology and industry trends           Required skills       Good knowledge on Embedded technologies, IoT, Industrial solutions,    Ability to engage with clients, advisors, analysts and intermediaries on relevant discussions   Ability to communicate effectively, verbally and in writing.   Work experience with US / Europe clients is added advantage   Ability to establish and maintain effective working relationships.   Ability to focus on client needs with a commitment to quality and ontime delivery.   Ability to prioritize, organize and perform multiple work assignments simultaneously while meeting deadlines.   Ability to identify and resolve problems through recommending and implementing creative solutions.   Proficient with Microsoft Office products, including Word, Excel, PowerPoint and Outlook.   Flexibility to undertake domestic and internal short-term travels for business purposes       Required experience        Showcases minimum 10- 15 years of demonstrated experience     Experience in working with leading IT / Engineering service providers     Experience in working with leading OEM and MSPs     Experience supporting internal and external stakeholders across different countries       Required education       Bachelor s degree in Science / Engineering     Equivalent combination of post-high school education and experience may be considered in lieu of a degree.

column2: We at Compunnel Technology is hiring for a Presales Analyst Job Title:  Presales Analyst Work Mode:  Work from Home Shift Timing:  01:00 PM. to 10:00 PM Job Description: The Presales Analyst plays a crucial role in supporting the federal sales team by providing technical expertise, solution design, and compelling demonstrations for cloud solutions, cybersecurity solutions, AI/ML solutions, and/or data solutions. This role collaborates with the sales team, technical experts, and proposal writers to develop solutions that address federal agency requirements. Role and Responsibilities: Technical Discovery:  Conduct in-depth needs assessments with potential clients to understand their pain points, technical requirements, and desired outcomes. Solution Design:  Develop and tailor technical solutions that align with client needs, leveraging cloud, cybersecurity, AI/ML, and data capabilities. Create architecture diagrams and solution overviews. RFP Support:  Collaborate with the proposal team to provide technical input, and solution descriptions, and ensure accurate representation of capabilities in responses to RFPs/RFQs. Competitive Analysis:  Stay informed about market trends, competitor offerings, and emerging technologies relevant to the federal cloud, cybersecurity, AI/ML, and data sectors. Qualification: Technical Background:  Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field or equivalent experience. Cloud Expertise:  Experience with one or more major cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP), and an understanding of cloud architectures, migration strategies, and cloud security. Cybersecurity Understanding:  Knowledge of cybersecurity principles, threat vectors, and compliance standards relevant to the federal space (e.g., FISMA, NIST 800-53). AI/ML and Data Familiarity:  Basic understanding of AI/ML concepts, use cases, and data analytics relevant to federal needs. Prior Experience:  3-5 years of experience in presales, technical consulting, and/or solution design, preferably with exposure to the federal market. Excellent Communication:  Strong written and verbal communication skills, tailoring technical concepts for a government audience. Interested candidates can share their updated profile at Ritiz.raj@compunnel.com or Whatsapp at 9599473399. About Compunnel: Compunnel, a business tenure of 28 years, A Great Place To Work Certified Incorporation, with a distinction of 7-time Inc. 5000 honoree, SIA reported one of largest Staffing Firms in the US and Microsoft Gold Certified has marked 200 Million in revenue with a wide network of 5000 Consultants, 500 employees with 10 offices in North America, 5 offices and the delivery centers across India. Compunnel is identified with 300+ placements in a month with Fortune 500 and Inc. 1000 companies to a math of 2000+ active clients, serving with 100s of regular and emerging skills in IT, Engineering, Professional and healthcare. We are self-reliant with our own competitive products in the talent landscape like Staffline Pro, Staff-line ATS, iEndourseU, Jobhuk, NurseDeck and Will-hire and have taken over and incorporated many staffing firms. We also have a specialized team of support functions, Legal, Onboarding, and Immigration. Thanks & Regards,

column2: Role & responsibilities     BNC Network,?the largest & most updated database of GCC construction projects in the Middle East is looking for an energetic & proficient  Tele-sales/Pre-sales Executive  to join their team and work remotely. About us ?We are Techies We created a unique state-of-the-art SaaS platform to automate lead generation and digitize the project-sales process. ?We are Researchers We created the region's largest project intelligence database and have held this position since 2004! ?We are Analysts We present actionable insights from our extensive data through construction analytics and thought leadership reports. ?We are Communicators We reach over 66,000 business leaders and industry professionals every day. ?We are Enablers We imagineer new ways to connect entities across the construction industry to transform information exchange on projects. Job Description The  Tele-sales/ Pre-sales Executive  will be the first point of contact with potential customers and will introduce the company, and its product offerings with poise and professionalism to initiate the sales process and in some cases make sales on the phone or online. The Executive is required to operate in line with the management directives and in accordance with the Companys policies, standards, and procedures which form the organizations quality management system. The Executive will be responsible for qualifying customers on the phone by understanding their business, mapping their needs to specific products, and presenting products online. The operational responsibilities of this position are: 1. Generating leads by contacting potential or existing customers to introduce the company and our products. 2. Answering queries about the company and its products. 3. Qualifying customers and identification of key contacts by engaging with them on the phone. 4. Understanding customer requirements and presenting the appropriate products as solutions. 5. Issuing proposals and closing deals on the phone where possible. 6. Coordinating sales meetings with the field sales team as required. 7. Maintaining detailed records of customer information and all customer interactions. 8. Meeting sales and marketing campaign targets. 9. Representing the company from time to time at industry events. In addition to the above, you will be expected to complete any other tasks assigned by your Supervisor. Preferred candidate profile   We'd love to hear from you if you have.. Education :?Bachelors Degree Experience :?2+ years in Inside sales or telemarketing of B2B products or promotional activities. Knowledge :?An understanding of the construction workflow for consultants, contractors, and suppliers. Soft Skills :?Strong telephone skills. Standard business protocols. Qualities :?Target-oriented. Systematic. Persistent. Follow-through. Technical Skills :?Comfortable using Gmail, social media, and spreadsheets. Languages :?Excellent written and spoken business English. Personality :?This job requires self-confidence and positivity. You must have a genuine interest in people to be able to strike meaningful conversations starting with a cold call. Special skills :?A strong voice is a useful attribute in this position. Perks and benefits: Remote work, 30 days paid leave + additional govt. holidays

column2: Job Title:  Solutions Architect - GenAI Job Location:  Remote, India (Other intl locations OK) Qualification Required:  Bachelor/Masters/PhD degree in Computer Science/Software Engineering/Mathematics/Business/Linguistics or Other equivalent degree/diploma Experience Required:  5-10 years (relevant experience). Strong foundation and hands-on experience in creative problem solving, and client facing technical project management and pre-sales. Must be comfortable working with global clients and within a global team.  Job Overview As a pre-sales Solutions Architect - GenAI you are supporting the Sales teams efforts to engage with prospective clients and translate their often custom requirements into a full-fledged, end-to-end solution. You will work on a wide range of dataset creation and annotation projects, supporting cutting edge AI research and development with a focus on LLM fine-tuning.  In order to establish new processes, you will be working closely with the Sales team, prospective and current clients, and our globally-based Project Management teams. You will also have the opportunity to design, coordinate, and product manage custom tooling and workflows. This role is remote, and the ideal candidate will be a self-directed learner, creative thinker, and workplace chameleon. You will need to be adaptive, curious, and resourceful, and enjoy working with a diverse team. Individuals with demonstrated experience working in and with engineering teams (whether in studies or professionally) will be the strongest candidates.  Role and Responsibilities:  Provides in-depth solutions consulting and program management for new annotation and corpus creation workflows, particularly within the domain of LLM creation and refinement which involves:   Designs and implements all workflows necessary to set-up and initiate new projects and achieve targeted deliverables.  Developing workflow guidelines  Validating findings and output with client teams  Coordinating execution of project with Delivery teams and Project Managers  Work with existing and prospective customers to deeply understand their proposed use case(s) and propose solutions based on iMerits core offerings, technology, and workforce capability.  Lead newly engaged customers through any technical sales consultation and project implementation phase, while building trust in the solutions offered by iMerit.  Provide consultative proposals and findings to clients in an organized and accessible manner. This includes a combination of data analysis, development of workflow proposals, and the ability to clearly map out processes and values provided by the iMerit team. While heavily consultative, the ability to win (and maintain) client trust is of great importance.  Manage multiple projects simultaneously, including the project design, development, implementation, and delivery.  Subject matter expert in domain, state of industry, new use cases, competition, and market intelligence Must have skills:  Experience working in annotation/labeling services, Data Ops, Label Ops, ML Ops  Experience in working in Natural Language Sciences  Basic to intermediate knowledge of programming languages such as HTML, PHP, Python, R.  Minimum 5-7years client facing experience working in a multinational organization.  Excellent communicator in English (written, verbal, and presentation)  Comfortable working with structured data and basic data engineering concepts  Proactive approach to problem solving and project management. Able to assess situations, and adjust approach accordingly.   Demonstrates experience in researching and improving knowledge related to market trends, technology, and concepts in the Machine Learning/Data Science field. Good to have skills:  Experience with Machine Learning  Experience with Generative AI  Product Management  Database Management   Experience working in a distributed team  Experience in a Technical role  Interest in social impact  Advanced Excel knowledge  Multi-lingual a plus!
column11: Solutions Architect, Generative AI, MLOps, Artificial Intelligence, Natural Language Processing, Presales, Solutioning

column2: JOB DESCRIPTION:- We are currently offering a 100% remote work opportunity for a dynamic individual to join our team as a Pre-Sales Engineer. In this pivotal role, you will be an integral part of the enterprise sales and account management team, actively supporting pre-sales activities for our US-based sales team. RESPONSIBILITIES :- Create sales opportunities through thorough research of target prospects, initiating contact with new accounts, and skillfully managing client communication and relationship building. Drive market research initiatives to bolster ongoing client projects and capitalize on upselling and cross-selling opportunities Efficiently coordinate sales appointments and client presentations in collaboration with the onsite sales team. Assist in marketing endeavors related to solution content, including coordination in developing the solution backlog and crafting pertinent content. Identify, create, develop, and take ownership of meaningful technology partnerships. Manage podcast support responsibilities by identifying and securing podcast guests, overseeing podcast publishing, coordinating marketing efforts Collaborate with the US-based sales team to facilitate client conversations and coordinate with the technical team for tasks such as proposal creation, RFP response, building Statements of Work (SoWs), and creating Proof of Concepts (PoCs). Demonstrate expertise in effectively utilizing CRM and digital platforms for lead generation and proficient lead management. Demonstrate the ability to work independently as well as collaborate effectively within cross-functional and diverse teams. REQUIREMENTS :- Academic degree in Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics (STEM), Data and Analytics preferred. 5 + years proven experience in a Pre-Sales Engineer or similar technical role.  Previous experience in an IT Service and/or technology company working closely with Sales, Account Management, Solution Team is preferred. Adaptable with the ability to switch tasks based on shifting priorities. ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:- As this is a remote position based in India, the working hours are from 3:00 PM to 12:00 AM India time to align with the US business hours. To ensure a productive work-from-home experience, candidates must have: Reliable and high-speed internet connectivity. A quiet and distraction-free secure place to work. A laptop computer with the necessary specifications to support remote work. If you are a motivated and technically skilled individual looking for a challenging yet rewarding remote opportunity, we invite you to apply and contribute to our dynamic team.

column2: We are currently seeking a Sales Engineer, a technical expert who works with sales / Business Development teams to understand customer needs and recommend solutions that meet those needs.          This is a key role in the sales process, as it involves both a deep understanding of the technical aspects of a product and the ability to communicate those details effectively to potential customers.          This individual must have a deep understanding of API technologies and its application in a variety of industries and use cases. You are the real rock star in the sales process.      ## Roles Responsibilities      The primary responsibilities of a Sales Engineer include:      - Technical knowledge: Maintaining a deep understanding of APIwiz capabilities, as well as the broader context of microservices and API-driven architectures.      - Customer engagement: Building and maintaining relationships with customers, and working with the sales team to understand their specific requirements and use cases for API lifecycle Management.      - Product demonstrations: Providing demonstrations and presentations to potential customers, highlighting their features, benefits, and technical specifications.      - Technical support: Providing technical support to customers throughout the sales process, and responding to any technical questions or concerns that may arise.      - Solution development: Working with the sales team to develop custom solutions that meet the unique needs of individual customers, and ensuring that the proposed solutions are technically sound and feasible.      - Collaboration: Collaborating with cross-functional teams, such as product development, marketing, and engineering, to ensure the sales team has the information and support they need to be successful.      - Sales support: Supporting the sales team in their efforts to close deals, by providing technical expertise and guidance throughout the sales process.      ## What we re looking for      A successful Sales Engineer will have a strong technical background, excellent communication and interpersonal skills, and the ability to work effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.      - 6+ plus years of sales engineering, technical support, or engineering experience.      - 3+ years experience in SaaS, Cloud, or similar industries.      - Experience presenting to senior business and technical executives with customized product demos, and handling any technical concerns or objections.      - Experience working with the client s technical team to develop POC and a joint plan to ensure smooth implementation.      - Ability to effectively convey customer requirements to Product Management, Support, and Engineering teams.      - Working knowledge of coding languages, including Java, Node.js, and Python.      - Prior experience using Jenkins, AWS, GCP, Docker, Apigee, Mulesoft, Kong, MongoDB, and Cassandra.      - Experience in a start-up or a start-up mentality.      - Experience developing products or contributing to open-source projects is a plus.      ## **Minimum Qualifications*     - Bachelors degree in Engineering, Computer Science or the equivalent in experience.      - Experience communicating technical information to non-technical stakeholders.      - Self starter who can work with limited direction.      - Proven track record of success in a fast growing and scaling business.

column2: As an AV Design Engineer and AV Presales professional, you will be responsible for designing and architecting audio-visual (AV) solutions and providing pre-sales support to clients.              You will work closely with sales teams, customers, and project managers to understand client requirements and develop innovative AV designs that meet their needs.              Additionally, you will provide technical expertise during the pre-sales process, including product demonstrations, system configurations, and customer consultations.              This role requires a strong technical background in AV technology, excellent communication skills, and the ability to work collaboratively in a dynamic environment.                    Responsibilities:                  AV Solution Design:                v            Collaborate with clients, sales teams, and project managers to gather requirements and understand project goals.              v            Design and engineer comprehensive AV solutions that align with client needs, budget, and industry standards.              v            Create detailed AV system diagrams, equipment lists, and installation plans.              v            Conduct feasibility studies and provide recommendations for AV technologies and equipment.              Pre-sales Support:                v            Assist sales teams with technical expertise during the pre-sales process.              v            Conduct product demonstrations and presentations to showcase AV capabilities and features.              v            Collaborate with clients to understand their AV requirements and provide consultative guidance.              v            Develop system configurations, quotes, and proposals based on client specifications.              Technical Consultation:                v            Provide technical advice and guidance to clients regarding AV technologies, standards, and best practices.              v            Conduct site visits and assess existing AV infrastructure for integration and compatibility.              v            Collaborate with internal teams to address technical queries and provide solutions to client concerns.              Project Collaboration:                v            Work closely with project managers and installation teams to ensure successful execution of AV designs.              v            Provide input and support during the project planning and implementation stages.              v            Collaborate with external vendors and suppliers to source AV equipment and ensure timely delivery.                        Industry Knowledge:              Stay up-to-date with the latest AV technologies, trends, and industry standards.          Attend industry conferences, seminars, and training sessions to enhance professional knowledge. Share insights and knowledge with colleagues and contribute to the development of best practices.                  Requirements          Requirements:                  v            Bachelors degree in Electronics, Electrical & Computer Science Engineering              v            Proven experience in AV design engineering and pre-sales support.              v            Strong knowledge of audio-visual technologies, including audio systems, video conferencing, digital signage, control systems, and networked AV solutions.              v            Proficiency in CAD software for designing AV system diagrams.              v            Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to effectively convey technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.              v            Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting abilities.              v            Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.              v            Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality solutions.                                    Certification:                  Industry Certifications:        AVIXA CTS / CTS-D / CTS-I              OEM Certifications:        Crestron, Extron, Kramer, Harman, Shure, Sennheiser, Biamp, Clearone, Cisco, Poly, Logitech, ZOOM, Microsoft Teams, Aurora..Etc

column2: Profile: Associate Sales Consultant About Policybazaar.com   Mission:  Make Indias billion-plus households financially safe and secure Values:  Fairness to all our stakeholders Vision:  A healthy and well-protected India PolicyBazaar.com is India's largest insurance marketplace and a leading fintech player globally. It has backing from a host of investors including the likes of Soft Bank, InfoEdge (Naukri.com), Temasek, Tiger Global Management, True North, Premji Invest. The portal started in 2008 with a purpose to educate people on insurance products and has had a significant influence on how insurance is bought in India. It has helped in driving penetration of pure life insurance, health insurance, and such products which were barely bought earlier. From receiving traffic of 180,000 visitors in 2008, PolicyBazaar.com has come a long way and today hosts over 100 million visitors yearly, and records 10 transactions on its platform every minute. The company collected Rs 3,500 cr of insurance premium in FY19, and is on track to double this figure in FY20. PolicyBazaar.com accounts for nearly 25% of Indias life cover, and over 7% of India?? retail health business.  It accounts for roughly half of all internet based insurance purchase in the country.. You will be bridge between Autodesk, Reseller/VARs/Solution partners and the front lines with our AutoCAD key customers in automotive, manufacturing, commerce, architecture, engineering and construction to help design comprehensive technical solutions that meet their critical business requirements. This role is instrumental in ensuring the success of our highest-profile customer productions and will collaborate with Autodesk engineering and product teams to advocate for our customers. Application Engineers/Associate Solution Consultants would be responsible to utilize end-users and resellers input and sales information to ensure and support the integration of Autodesk solutions and services, addressing customer?? business requirements and challenges across Malaysia. The Associate Solutions Consultant shall work on the targeted accounts independently for the possible closure, as required.  The position reports direct to a Datech Malaysia Manager-Solutions Consultant. Key focus area: Industry and Technical Specialty : Manufacturing (CAD,CAE,CAM)/ Architecture, Engineering, Construction, Desktop and SaaS/PaaS applications etc. Account Management:  Technical Account Management, Customer Success etc. Technical Marketing Management:  Content creation and management, Onsite/online event organization etc. Partner Enablement and Management:  Continuous engagement, Collaboration etc. Essential Duties & Responsibilities Directs and coordinates Pre-Sales, Post-Sales, Consulting & Technical Support services activities and provide expertise to customers together with the partners and Autodesk by performing technical discussions, solution demonstrations, deployment and installation, mentoring, implementation, maintenance etc. to position and adoption of AutoCAD IST applications and portfolio. Organize and conduct enablement activities such as solution and workflow presentations, trainings/mentoring, workshops, webinars, seminars covering Autodesk/ Datech solutions and products for resellers and their customers. Analyze customer enquiries and map/develop solutions for AutoCAD IST. Organize and deliver training courses and mentoring sessions for AutoCAD IST and related solutions.  Deliver product presentations to customers (in-house, fairs etc) and tradeshows, webinars etc. Deliver online training courses (internet) for sales partners and their customers. Provide project support for customer projects (billable). Support Datech staff with Autodesk product related topics. Create, document and publish hard and software benchmarks in the Autodesk environment. Write product-specific articles for in-house and external professional media (e.g. Datech Portal). Active participation in marketing initiatives conducted by Datech Business Unit for technical, application purposes. Be an Industry/subject matter expert on allocated product group. Skills & experience Because Associate Solution Consultants operate at the intersection of the Autodesk, Value Added Resellers and end-user customers, they must possess strong communication abilities, excellent mathematical skills and the capacity to facilitate teamwork across departments. Solution Consultants are uniquely talented in both customer success and services and detail-oriented, proficient in analytical tasks and in consequence should be an excellent communicator, both orally and in writing.  Knowledge and/or experience of AutoCAD and other competitor solutions. Demonstrated track record of customer-centric service, either technical pre-sales or consultancy, and team-first approach. column1: Presales Consultant- IT business Solutions & service
column2: Proven track record of success in selling IT solutions, system integrator services, or enterprise applications/solutions to large corporate clients.   Overview Of Profile: As an IT Presales Consultant, your main objective will be to drive sales of IT business solutions, system integrator services, and application/solution offerings to enterprise customers. You will play a critical role in the sales process, from prospecting new clients to maintaining relationships with existing ones, and ultimately delivering persuasive sales presentations to achieve sales targets.   Roles & responsibilities: Utilize the Gem portal to identify and bid on government contracts related to IT solutions and services. Monitor the platform regularly for relevant opportunities, prepare and submit bids, and ensure compliance with Gem guidelines and regulations. Identify and target prospective enterprise clients who could benefit from our IT solutions and services. Utilize various channels such as cold calling, networking events, and referrals to generate leads and expand the client base. Cultivate and maintain strong relationships with existing clients to understand their evolving needs and preferences. Act as a trusted advisor, providing insights and recommendations on how our IT solutions can address their business challenges and drive growth. Organize and conduct engaging sales presentations to showcase the value proposition of our IT solutions and services. Tailor presentations to address the specific requirements and pain points of each client, highlighting key features, benefits, and success stories. Prepare detailed proposals, quotes, and contracts for government contracts through the Gem portal, ensuring accuracy and compliance with regulations. Address any technical or commercial concerns raised by clients and provide clear and compelling proposals. Collaborate with the sales team and technical experts to develop customized IT solutions that align with the unique needs and objectives of clients. Leverage your understanding of industry trends and best practices to design comprehensive solutions that deliver tangible business outcomes. Prepare detailed proposals, quotes, and contracts that outline the scope of work, pricing, and terms of engagement. Ensure proposals are accurately aligned with client requirements and company capabilities, addressing any technical or commercial concerns. Engage in negotiations with clients to address objections, clarify terms, and finalize agreements. Use your persuasive communication skills and strategic thinking to overcome obstacles and secure successful deals within established timelines. Stay abreast of industry trends, competitor offerings, and market dynamics related to IT solutions and services. Conduct market research and analysis to identify new opportunities for business expansion and competitive differentiation. Set ambitious sales targets in collaboration with sales management and work diligently to achieve or exceed them. Monitor sales performance, track progress against targets, and take proactive measures to address any deviations or challenges.   Skills and Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, or a related field. Proven track record of success in selling IT solutions, system integrator services, or enterprise applications/solutions to large corporate clients. Strong business acumen with the ability to understand client needs, identify opportunities, and articulate value propositions effectively. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport and credibility with clients at all levels of the organization. Strategic thinking and problem-solving abilities to develop innovative sales strategies and overcome objections. Proficiency in sales techniques and methodologies, with experience in conducting persuasive sales presentations and negotiations. Knowledge of IT industry trends, emerging technologies, and competitive landscape. Results-oriented mindset with a focus on achieving and exceeding sales targets. Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.

Prepare information for meetings including company research, data population, and briefing documents Responsible for customer relationship management (CRM) data input, pipeline hygiene and reporting. Conducts analysis and reporting of data to drive effective decision-making and maintain accurate and up-to-date information in our customer relationship management (CRM) tool. Research on new and existing leads and updating information in Customer Relationship Management (DealCloud) tool. Assist with the aggregation and import of new BD contacts during onboarding of new hires. Capable of executing a wide range of Ad-hoc Sales Leadership and Sales Operations requests that include account and contact hygiene, data mining, proposal support and leadership projects. Support Sales Operations implementation and change management efforts surrounding the deployment and enhancements to new tools, processes, and best practices.  Assist in the development and organization of Sales Assets and Training materials.  Support efforts related to industry related conferences, events, and sponsorships. Assist with client mapping requests.  Coordinate engagement wrap up activities including client satisfaction and case study development. Support the larger Global Operations Team for the development, polishing and organizing, materials for use of the broader team and firm.  Capable of managing and executing small to medium size projects.  Pre-requisites and skillsets required to apply for this role:   Should have 1-3 years of work experience that has touched on things like communications, project management, relationship science, or sales operations. You are tech savvy and are confident in your abilities to learn and master new platforms and software for the benefit of all. Experience with Sales tools such as: Deal Cloud, PitchBook, LISN, Seamless.AI. ZoomInfo, and Microsoft Office (Excel / PowerPoint). You appreciate analytics and know that meaningful information tells a great story. You love data. You have experience with CRM and/or ERP systems. You understand what we mean by "beautiful execution" and are excited to join a team that values your extreme attention to detail. We want to stress that attention to detail is a key component of this role. You can manage up effectively and track several threads simultaneously. You can work confidently work with senior team members and are comfortable giving presentations on topics you are knowledgeable on. You have EQ in spades and are fun to work with.

column2: As a Presales Manager at Motadata, you will be responsible for leading the presales team and collaborating with various departments to develop compelling proposals and solutions for our clients     You will play a pivotal role in understanding client requirements, shaping solutions, and ensuring seamless communication between the sales and delivery teams     The ideal candidate should have a strong technical background, excellent communication skills, and a proven track record of successful presales management             Collaborate with the sales team and Partners to understand customer requirements and propose technical solutions. Provide product demonstrations and presentations to potential customers and Partners, both inperson and virtually. Customer requirement gathering and documentation.         Prepare the Documentations like Solution Architecture, Technical Proposal, Solution Presentation, SOW, defining the solution USP, Prepare H/w sizing BOM and Software etc         Setting up PoC (Proof of Concepts) as per customer requirement. Assisting the development team in understanding the requirements and defining the scope/statement of work.         Engage in product training and continuously update knowledge of the companys offerings and associated technologies. Assist in the development of sales strategies and go-to-market plans.         Collaborate with the product development/ PMG team to relay customer feedback and assist in product improvement.         Attend the industry events, conferences, trade shows etc to network and generate leads.         Should have worked with NMS or ITSM solutions (Solarwinds, WhatsUpGold, PRTG, Freshworks, ServiceNow, BMC etc)         Should have experience in designing solution documents and proposals for NMS tenders.         Should have basic knowledge of Networking, Server, Application, Cloud, SDN and IOT technology.         Should have excellent communication and presentation skills both verbal and written. column1: Consultant - GOSO - Sales Force Optimization - JAPAN
column2: ?     Note: Roles are posted at the lowest level of a band, however, employees should search across all levels of the band to identify all opportunities. Employees hired on banded positions (ex: P1-P3, R1-R2, B1-B3, etc.) transfer at their current level, despite the level indicated on the job posting. For example, if a P2 candidate is selected for a P1-P3 banded position, the candidate will remain a P2 in the new role.             The LCCI (Lilly Capability Center India), GOSO team was started in 2020 with the objective of supporting business decisions for the commercial functions in the US and ex-US affiliates (IBU).     IBU affiliates are continuing to look for avenues to expand horizons of value and hence the LCCI GOSO SFO team is ramping up the international business unit (IBU) -Japan engagement. We are looking for a techno-functional leader to provide thought leadership to a team of talented analytics professionals. The vision for this role is to help grow and penetrate the engagement further, to help expand the capabilities and drive global initiatives.     Core Responsibilities             The GOSO - SFO - IBU Consultant will report to the GOSO - SFO IBU Leader and will work on critical capabilities of SFO for Japan Affiliates. These capabilities may include sales force sizing, sales force structure, territory alignment design and maintenance, field call planning support, and customer targeting.     Ownership of Project Delivery     o SME on Sales Force Optimization areas like Customer Segmentation Targeting, Sales Force Size Structure, Territory Deployment, Call Planning     o Lead multiple projects for JP geography on key SFO areas and ensuring quality and timely delivery of the projects.     o Serve as trusted advisor by actively participating in various phases of the projects (including kick-off, methodology development, execution, insight generation and data visualizations)     o Effectively communicate with stakeholders to present the final outcomes and provide recommendations as needed.     o Build and exhibit deep expertise on Japan Commercial business and the problems that are being solved by data and analytics.     Project Management and leadership     o Set up processes to ensure continuous high-quality delivery by the team, including but not limited to implementing best project management practices     o Support a team of highly talented professionals; and implement upskilling plans as required for business need, working in close collaboration with the Japanese and LCCI leadership     o Serve as an advisor, and a coach, work with functional leads to identify career opportunities for team members, focusing on career path development and with individual experiences     o Contribute to an inclusive community of analytics expert practitioners     o Use data and reports to develop, optimize, and implement strategies aimed at improving sales teams performance     o Develop approaches to design and align territories, incl. structure, size, and deployment     o Partner with affiliates to determine their organizational needs for sales force optimization     Strategic growth and thought leadership     o Strategize on key opportunities/ whitespaces, drive discussions and expand outcomes from LCCI for JP SFO analytics requirements.     o Monitor customer and marketplace to identify opportunities to optimize sales operations strategy     o Lead the creation of models such as the customer behaviour profile to support the Sales team to enhance performance and track performance of the field force against plans     o Integrate working model for analytics capabilities across analytics teams, and where possible, across other LCCI teams to drive better cross-team resourcing, cross-pollination of best practices and expansion of capabilities.     o Network with industry experts and external consultants as needed to develop, test, and implement new approaches and solutions for analytics capabilities at LCCI     Other Key accountabilities will include the following:     Excellent Communication skills with stakeholders     Mentor and coach team members to support talent development of the team     Evaluate and resolve complex business and operational problems and challenges that arise in the course of the projects     Identify opportunities for enhanced sales force execution     Complete Ownership of analysis on effectiveness of field force     Basic Qualifications     Bachelor s Degree     Ensure compliance with company policies and any applicable state and federal marketing and promotion laws and regulations.     Experience Required     8-10 years of relevant work experience with demonstrated experience of working in commercial analytics domain, managing complex projects and cross-functional teams     Deep understanding of Japan s pharma and healthcare eco-system, data sets etc.     Language expertise - Ability to read/write/ speak in English and Japanese language (good to have)     Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to be able to structure and solve open ended business problems     Additional Skills/Preferences     Strong learning agility and analytical mindset     Excellent communication and prioritization skills with attention to detail     High level of motivation and a strong desire to find creative solutions to challenging situations     Experience in business analysis     Additional Information Eli Lilly is an EEO/Affirmative Action Employer, and does not discriminate on the basis of age, race, colour, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other legally protected status.         Note: When applying internally for a position your current supervisor receives notification that you have applied to the position. We encourage employees to discuss the opportunity with their supervisor prior to applying.

column2: The main role of the consultant will be to support the Sales Process by demonstrating the Centric PLM system business value and gaining the technology buy-in from the prospective customer. It is a Pre-Sales Consultant position.                  The consultant will need to perform all Pre-Sales activities required to sell Centric Solution to customers. The goal is to have the consultant self-sufficient as much as possible and ultimately become a Centric product expert.                    Responsibilities:                  This means a mix of both business and strong technical consulting skills to:                    Understand the software product fully and the applicability to grocery retail.                      Install and configure the product to be self-sufficient.                      Demonstrate the system in pre-sales situation, including personalizing it for the prospect with their data and processes                      Create ROIs for prospects                      Respond to RFPs and RFIs                      Analyze/understand business requirements (process / use cases flow mapped to software features)                      Build a Statement of Work with services estimates                      Conduct IT architecture and HW&SW requirement discussions, including hosting options                      Provide feedback to Product Management teams for customer and prospect enhancements                      Work with Marketing to help promote the solution through webinars, white papers, etc.                      In addition:                    The Consultant should have strong computer skills making him/her comfortable with database and recent enterprise system technologies although the position does not require full programming skills.                  The consultant will be managed by the Director Presales. They will have access to the Worldwide team as well as US based Corporate to support him for customer situations.                  In addition to supporting customer deployments the consultant may be involved in some post-sales situation to help with project activities.                  Centric is aggressively penetrating the PLM market, so a sales attitude will be requested to professionally advertise Centric s confidence to provide value to their customers. The ability to deal with customers and handle customer situation alone as much as possible will be key.                  Centric is a growing company requiring from consultants a real sense of initiative and autonomy to deal with everyday situation. The candidate will have to be comfortable working alone with clear project success goals, without permanent supervision.                  Significant travelling is expected to visit customer mostly within the region, although some international travel will be required. A valid Passport or Visa will be necessary.                    Qualifications:                    Bachelor s degree or equivalent                  Significant experience at large software ERP, Supply Chain, PLM vendor (    with similar pre-sales role    ) or alternatively used a PLM system in a leading role at a Grocery Retailer or Food and Beverage Company. Specifically, system demonstrations and presentation skills are needed.                  Profound knowledge in the Grocery Retail, Convenience Store and Food Service Industries.                  Excellent Presentation and Communication skills                  Technical Skills are a plus: E.g., Windows server environment, Web Application server (WildFly, Tomcat), XML programming, HTML, JavaScript, Databases (MSSQL, Oracle), and knowledge of Virtual Machines.

column2: Minimum 5-10 years of experience in sales, preferably with experience in the multimedia industry.                                     About the Role                   :                               The Sales Consultant for Multimedia will be instrumental in driving sales of multimedia products and services. This role involves understanding the rapidly evolving multimedia landscape, including video, audio, graphics, and digital content creation, and leveraging this knowledge to meet and exceed sales targets.                                     Education Criteria                 :                            Bachelor s or Master s degree in Business, Computer Science, arts, or a related field.                 Additional certifications or courses in technologies are highly desirable.                                   Detailed Job Description                                   Market and Client Analysis: Conduct extensive market research to identify emerging trends and potential clients in the multimedia industry. Understand the competitive landscape to strategically position our multimedia offerings.                         Client Engagement and Relationship Building: Build and maintain relationships with potential and existing clients. Understand their business needs and challenges to effectively tailor multimedia solutions.                         Sales Strategy Development: Develop and implement innovative sales strategies that resonate with the multimedia market. Adapt sales tactics to meet the ever-changing demands of the industry and client preferences.                         Solution Presentation and Demonstration: Present multimedia products and services to clients through engaging demonstrations. Ensure clear communication of the features, benefits, and competitive advantages of our offerings.                         Negotiation and Deal Closure: Lead negotiations with clients, ensuring mutually beneficial terms and successful deal closures. Maintain a keen focus on achieving sales targets and expanding the client base.                         Collaboration with Creative and Technical Teams: Work closely with creative and technical teams to ensure that client requirements are clearly understood and met. Provide feedback from the market to aid in the development and refinement of multimedia offerings.                         Post-Sale Client Management: Establish strong post-sale relationships to ensure client satisfaction and identify opportunities for additional sales, including upselling and cross-selling.                         Sales Reporting and Market Feedback: Regularly report on sales progress and market feedback. Analyze performance against sales targets and strategize on addressing any gaps.                                   Key skills and other requirements                                   Profound knowledge of the multimedia industry, including current trends and technologies.                 Proven track record in sales, with a focus on multimedia or related fields.                 Exceptional communication and presentation skills, crucial for demonstrating multimedia solutions.                 Strong relationship-building and client management abilities.                 Strategic and creative thinking to develop effective sales strategies.                 Ability to work collaboratively with creative and technical teams.                 Resilience and adaptability in a fast-paced and creative environment.                 Proficiency in CRM and sales-related software tools.
column11: Graphics, Sales strategy, digital content, Sales, Relationship building, Market research, Client management, CRM

column2: As a consultant you will be involved in demand generation & consult the CXO stakeholders about our service offerings. You will be closely working with Google/ AWS Field and customer engineering teams to evangelize our expertise on Cloud, Data & AI/ML services. You are expected to navigate stakeholders who would be decision makers for Startups, ScaleUps, Enterprise & ISV s with a value proposition to use advanced cloud services.        You are a great fit if    You have the ability to articulate and demonstrate cloud services suitable for customer workloads, mapping the right set of services on IaaS, PaaS & SaaS        You are curious    . You keep up with the breakneck speed of innovation on the public cloud. When something new gets released or an existing service changes - you try it out and you learn.        You are an active listener    . You listen to the prospects and uncover opportunities for Cloudside. Taking initiatives to generate demand and being proactive in proposing the designed offerings and solutions.        Required Skills        Min 3+ years of overall experience ( College Graduates can be considered)      Min 1 + years of selling GCP / AWS / Azure services. ( College Graduates can be considered )      Ability to use prospecting toolsets and conduct campaigns, cold calling ( Whenever necessary )      Understanding of Google Cloud platform/ AWS services and mapping the problem statements to solution offerings      Establishing new, and maintaining existing, relationships with customers.      Managing and interpreting customer requirements, persuading clients that a product or service will best satisfy their needs      Gains customer acceptance by explaining or demonstrating cost reductions and operations improvements      Maintains professional and techno-functional knowledge by attending educational workshops, reviewing professional publications, establishing personal networks, and participating in professional forums        Great to Have        Certifications - GCP and/or AWS, practitioner or professional level      Problem Solving & Presentation Skills      You are associated with Industry forums , groups, fintech associations

column2: SHARAYU GROUP is looking for Sales Consultants to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey       A Sales Consultant, also known as a Sales Representative or Sales Associate, is responsible for selling products or services to customers and generating revenue for a company     Their primary objective is to meet or exceed sales targets by understanding customer needs, providing solutions, and building strong relationships     Here's a typical job description for a Sales Consultant:Job Title: Sales Consultant       Job Description:       Identify and reach out to potential customers through various channels, including cold calling, email campaigns, and networking     Conduct thorough market research to identify target markets and potential customers     Build and maintain relationships with new and existing customers, understanding their needs and providing appropriate product or service recommendations     Present and demonstrate products or services to customers, highlighting their features and benefits     Negotiate pricing, terms, and conditions of sales agreements to maximize sales opportunities     Close sales deals and achieve monthly, quarterly, and annual sales targets     Maintain accurate and up-to-date sales records, including customer information, sales activities, and pipeline management     Stay informed about industry trends, market conditions, and competitor activities to identify new business opportunities     Collaborate with internal teams, such as marketing, product development, and customer support, to ensure customer satisfaction and resolve any issues     Participate in sales meetings, training sessions, and conferences to enhance product knowledge and improve sales skills     Continuously develop and refine sales techniques, staying updated with the latest sales methodologies and best practice
