column2: As a Pre-Sales Executive, you will play a crucial role in driving the sales efforts of the company by actively engaging with potential customers, understanding their needs, and presenting appropriate solutions. Your primary responsibility will be to support the sales team in generating leads, qualifying prospects, and assisting in the conversion of opportunities into successful sales. You will work closely with the sales and marketing teams to create compelling presentations and proposals that effectively showcase the company s products or services.          Responsibilities:              Lead Generation:    Collaborate with the marketing team to identify and generate potential leads through various channels such as online research, industry events, trade shows, and networking.            Qualification:    Engage with leads to understand their requirements, budget, and timeline. Assess the potential fit between the customer s needs and the company s offerings, ensuring that qualified opportunities are prioritized.            Solution Presentation:    Conduct effective product demonstrations and presentations to potential customers, showcasing the features, benefits, and unique selling points of the company s offerings. Customize presentations to address specific client needs and pain points.            Proposal Creation:    Collaborate with the sales team to develop persuasive proposals and quotations that align with the customer s requirements. Clearly communicate the value proposition, pricing, and terms to facilitate successful deal closures.            Technical Expertise:    Develop a deep understanding of the company s products or services, including their technical aspects, functionalities, and integration capabilities. Be able to address customer questions and concerns related to product specifications, implementation, and support.            Relationship Building:    Build and maintain strong relationships with prospects and customers through effective communication, timely follow-ups, and proactive engagement. Understand customer pain points and offer tailored solutions that meet their unique business needs.            Market Intelligence:    Stay updated on industry trends, competitive landscape, and emerging technologies. Conduct market research and analysis to identify new opportunities, potential partnerships, and areas for product enhancement or differentiation.            Collaboration:    Work closely with the sales team, marketing team, product managers, and other stakeholders to ensure a cohesive and streamlined sales process. Provide feedback from customers to relevant teams to drive product improvements and innovation.            Qualifications:            Bachelor s degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field (or equivalent experience).          Proven experience in a pre-sales, sales, or business development role, preferably in a technology or software company.          Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to articulate complex ideas in a clear and concise manner.          Strong understanding of sales principles and techniques, with a track record of achieving or exceeding sales targets.          Ability to quickly grasp technical concepts and effectively convey them to non-technical audiences.          Customer-focused mindset with the ability to build rapport and establish long-term relationships.          Strong organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize and manage multiple opportunities simultaneously.          Proficiency in using CRM software and other sales tools to track and manage leads and opportunities.          Analytical mindset with the ability to gather and interpret market data, customer insights, and competitive intelligence.          Self-motivated, proactive, and results-driven, with a passion for driving business growth.

column2: Job Overview: We are seeking an experienced and driven Sales CRM Product Manager to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for bridging the gap between the intricate world of Sales CRM and our business needs. By deeply understanding our pre-sales, sales, and post-sales processes, this role aims to translate complex requirements into user-friendly features and functionalities, ensuring our Sales CRM platform fully supports our business objectives. Key Responsibilities: 1. Understanding and Representing User Needs:   - Conduct user research and gather requirements from sales, marketing, customer service, and other relevant departments to ensure the CRM system meets their needs.   - Create detailed user stories and personas to guide product development. 2. Monitor Sales Product KPIs:   - Establish, track, and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) related to CRM usage, feature adoption, and ROI.   - Use data-driven insights to guide product improvements and decisions. 3. Develop Product Strategy:   - Create and maintain a product roadmap that aligns with the company's strategic goals, market opportunities, and user feedback.   - Identify new features and enhancements to improve user experience and business outcomes. 4. Oversee Product Development:   - Work closely with the development team to ensure timely and high-quality delivery of CRM features and updates.   - Facilitate agile ceremonies and ensure clear communication between stakeholders and the development team. 5. Manage Product Life Cycle:   - Evaluate and prioritize product enhancements and upgrades throughout the CRM system's life cycle.   - Stay ahead of Sales updates and industry trends to ensure the platform remains cutting-edge. 6. Manage Product Launch:   - Coordinate cross-functional teams to ensure successful product launches and updates.   - Develop and execute go-to-market strategies, including training materials and user documentation. 7. Prioritize the Needs of Customers and Stakeholders:   - Balance the needs and priorities of various stakeholders, including users, executives, and external partners.   - Advocate for user-centric design and functionality within the product development process. Required Skills and Qualifications: - Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Business Administration, or a related field. - Proven experience or knack as a Product Manager, preferably with Sales CRM. - Strong understanding of Sales functionalities, limitations, and best practices. - Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with a strong data-driven approach to decision making. - Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, capable of working with cross-functional teams. - Experience with agile development methodologies. - Sales certifications (e.g., Sales Administrator, Sales Platform App Builder) are a plus.
column11: Product Management, CRM Sales, CRM

column2: Job Purpose:           Working with the Company's Sales Team, the Presales Consultant is responsible for providing presales technical support to the Sales team and presenting tailored demonstrations or qualification discussions to customers and/or prospects. The Presales Consultant also assists the Sales Team with qualifying opportunities - in or out and helping expand existing opportunities through solid questioning. The Presales Consultant will be responsible on conducting Technical Proof of Concept, Demonstration & Presentation on the supported products & solution.         Responsibilities:         Assist Account/Product Managers with qualification of opportunities by providing presales technical support.       Provides pre-sales technical support and deliver deep dive product demonstrations to customers and business partners.       Delivers training to partners on products solution.       Contribute to and refine technical RFP/RFI responses       Customer demonstrations and presentations       Coordinating and managing technical validation events (POC)       Coordinating and managing POC assets       Participating in conferences, shows, exhibitions when appropriate and requested       Recommend and influence market content.       Performs other related duties as assigned.             Knowledge, Skills and Experience         Requires an in-depth knowledge of vendor products and general networking technologies including TCP/IP, DNS (UNIX) Admin, and experience with switches, routers, and firewalls in Intranet/Internet environments.       Good Network & Security knowledge       Strong interpersonal and presentation skills, with ability to articulate complex technology simply.       Ability to troubleshoot and solve technical problems.       Self-motivated and flexible.       Ability to effectively multi-task and be able to handle a high volume of requests, specifically unplanned/unscheduled requests.         Able to execute instructions and to request clarification when needed.           Able to exhibit ability to be sensitive to the needs, concerns, and feeling of others.           Able to interact effectively with all levels of management.               What s In It For You?         Elective Benefits:  Our programs are tailored to your country to best accommodate your lifestyle.     Grow Your Career:  Accelerate your path to success (and keep up with the future) with formal programs on leadership and professional development, and many more on-demand courses.     Elevate Your Personal Well-Being:  Boost your financial, physical, and mental well-being through seminars, events, and our global Life Empowerment Assistance Program.     Diversity, Equity & Inclusion:  It s not just a phrase to us; valuing every voice is how we succeed. Join us in celebrating our global diversity through inclusive education, meaningful peer-to-peer conversations, and equitable growth and development opportunities.     Make the Most of our Global Organization : Network with other new co-workers within your first 30 days through our onboarding program.     Connect with Your Community:  Participate in internal, peer-led inclusive communities and activities, including business resource groups, local volunteering events, and more environmental and social initiatives.           Don t meet every single requirement? Apply anyway. If you re excited about working for our company and believe you re a good fit for this role, we encourage you to apply. You may be exactly the person we re looking for!         We are an equal opportunity employer and committed to building a team that represents and empowers a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills. column2: We are looking only for Immediate joiner (0-7 days)  Job Description: As a Pre-Sales lead, you will play a crucial role in the sales process by actively engaging with potential customers and guiding them through the initial stages of the sales cycle. You will work closely with the sales team, leveraging your pre-sales expertise and IT services knowledge to effectively demonstrate the value and benefits of ThoughtFocus services. Your main objective will be to provide responses to RFPs/RFIs, requests for presentations and other response material and contribute to the overall sales revenue of the organization. Responsibilities: 1. Solution Design: Collaborate with the sales team, practice managers, vertical heads, and delivery leads and engineers to design customized solutions that address the unique requirements of each prospect. Provide technical expertise and recommendations during the solution design process. 2.  Must have experience in BFSI domain (Payments/Mortgage/Capital markets) 3. Proposal Development: Prepare and present compelling proposals and quotes that outline the value proposition, pricing, and terms of the proposed solution. Address customer requirements effectively. 4. Qualify Leads: Evaluate the needs and requirements of potential customers to determine their level of interest and fit with the company's products or services. Assess their budget, timelines, and decision-making process. 5. Relationship Building: Foster strong relationships with prospects and key stakeholders throughout the pre-sales process. Understand their business challenges and establish trust by providing consultative guidance and industry insights. 6. Competitive Analysis: Stay updated on market trends, industry competition, and service industry developments to effectively position the company's offerings against competitors. Highlight key differentiators and advantages. 7. Collaboration: Work closely with the sales team, marketing, and engineering teams to align strategies and ensure a seamless experience for all stakeholders in the sales cycle. Provide feedback from prospects to help refine service offerings and sales strategies. 8. Sales Support: Provide support to the sales team in terms of technical expertise, proposal development, and addressing customer inquiries. Assist with contract negotiations and closing deals when necessary. Qualifications 5  10 years of prior paid experience in a pre-sales role with basic knowledge of key technologies and a thorough understanding of IT services business model. Bachelor??/Master?? degree in Engineering, Business Administration, Computer Applications, or a related field (preferred). Strong knowledge of IT services as well as the industry and market dynamics. Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to articulate complex concepts in a clear and concise manner. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to understand customer requirements and design appropriate solutions. Customer-focused mindset with a passion for delivering exceptional service. Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment. Proficiency in using CRM software and other sales enablement tools.
column11: Proposal Development, Bfsi, Mortgage, Contract Negotiations

column2: As a Pre-Sales Lead, you will be the lead actor in our pre-sales and marketing initiatives, playing a critical role in shaping the solution and value articulation for prospective customers.          Roles Responsibilities           Market Research:    Conduct in-depth research to understand industry trends, customer segments, and the competitive landscape. Stay ahead of emerging solutions and product dynamics.        Value Creation:    Craft compelling sales collateral and presentations. Draw on success stories to build a strong value proposition, helping prospects envision a transformative future with our product.        Strategic Execution:    Drive successful closures, and empower the sales team with innovative ideas, collaterals, and proposal responses. Analyze win/loss ratios to continuously improve our approach.        Cross-functional Collaboration:    Collaborate cross-functionally with product and sales team to map customer needs to product use cases, draft solutions and value proposition.     Quality and Effectiveness of Collateral and Responses              Skills Experience         5+ years of experience in pre-sales or similar roles, with a preference for backgrounds in BFS, FinTech, or AIOps.      A degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.      Exceptional people and communication skills, with a detail-oriented and organized approach. Agility and flexibility to thrive in uncertain environments.      Proven experience in solutioning, estimation and pricing.      A deep passion for technology and the start-up ecosystem.         Educational Qualifications   : bachelors degree in business administration, marketing, computer science, or related field (or equivalent work experience).       100% Health Coverage of Medical insurance along with family.     Financial protection on disability, Life and accidental death for the employee.     100% Parents Coverage for Medical insurance.     Mental wellness programs, and counseling with 1:1 sessions

column2: Collaborate with the sales team to understand client requirements and provide technical and analytical solutions that meet their needs.                  Develop and deliver compelling presentations and demonstrations of Tsaaroservices to prospective clients.                  Prepare detailed proposals, including cost estimates, project timelines, financial models, and technical specifications.                  Conduct financial and economic assessments to identify gaps in clients current practices and provide data-driven recommendations.                  Support the sales team in responding to RFPs, RFIs, and other client inquiries with a focus on financial and technical accuracy.                  Maintain a deep understanding of Tsaaroservices, and industry trends, particularly in fin tech and analytics.                  Work closely with the consulting and technical teams to ensure smooth handover of projects from pre-sales to delivery.                  Provide feedback to the consulting team on client requirements and potential improvements, especially those related to financial services and fin tech.                  Attend industry events, webinars, and training sessions to stay current with the latest trends and technologies in data privacy, security, finance, and fin tech.                Requirements          Bachelors degree in Economics, Finance, Business Administration, Information Technology, or a related field.            2-3 years of experience in a pre-sales.            Strong technical background with the ability to understand and explain complex financial and analytical solutions.            Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills.            Proven experience in creating detailed proposals and financial models.            Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.            Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and CRM software.            Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.

Acquire in-depth knowledge of product features and benefits to effectively communicate value to customers. Negotiate/close deals and handle complaints or objections Collaborate with team members to achieve better results. column2: Serve as the technical expert on Salesforce products and solutions.            Conduct in-depth product demonstrations to showcase the capabilities of Salesforce to potential clients.            Collaborate with the sales team to understand customer requirements and recommend the most suitable solutions.            Good understanding of setting up demo orgs, customizing Salesforce based on customer requirements.                        Solution Design:                    Work closely with clients to understand their business processes and requirements.            Design and architect Salesforce solutions that address the unique needs of each client.            Create detailed technical proposals, including system architecture, integrations, and customizations.                    Client Engagement:                    Act as a trusted advisor to clients, providing expert guidance on Salesforce best practices and industry trends.            Build and maintain strong client relationships through effective communication and exceptional service.                    Team Collaboration:                    Work closely with the sales team to support the sales cycle, from initial contact to deal closure.            Collaborate with the delivery team to ensure a seamless transition from pre-sales to project implementation.                    Market Research:                    Stay up-to-date with the latest Salesforce features, products, and industry trends.            Conduct market research to identify opportunities for expanding our Salesforce offerings.                    Qualifications:                    Salesforce certifications (e.g., Salesforce Certified Administrator, Salesforce Certified Platform App Builder) are highly desirable.            Proven experience in pre-sales engineering or technical consulting for Salesforce solutions.            Strong understanding of CRM concepts and Salesforce architecture.            Excellent communication and presentation skills.            Ability to travel occasionally for client meetings and presentations (Europe and Middle East Primarily)

column2: Job Criteria:          Ensure all enquiries are responded on time as per SOP.      Guide and Support team, handle escalations.      Corresponding calls and distribution management.      Monitor all incoming leads, specially lost and disqualified leads.      Audit and review all in-coming leads.      Handling various inbound lead channels.      Outbound lead generations.              Key Responsibilities    :      1. Team Leadership and Development:      Lead, mentor, and motivate a team of pre-sales specialists to achieve individual and team targets.      Provide guidance, training, and support to enhance the team's technical and soft skills.      Foster a collaborative and inclusive work environment that encourages creativity, innovation, and continuous improvement.      2. Pre-Sales Strategy and Planning:      Develop and execute comprehensive pre-sales strategies aligned with the company's sales objectives and market trends.      Ensure catering fastest response time to any customer enquiry and leads calls.      Collaborate with sales leadership to define target markets, customer segments, and key accounts for focused outreach.      Analyze market dynamics, competitor activities, and customer feedback to identify new opportunities and refine the pre-sales approach.      3. Solution Design and Development:      Work closely with the product management and engineering teams to understand product capabilities, roadmap, and customization options.      Translate customer requirements into tailored solutions, product configurations, and value-added services.      Leverage technical expertise to address customer inquiries, resolve concerns, and position our offerings as the best-fit solution.      4. Sales Support and Enablement:      Partner with the sales team throughout the sales cycle to provide technical expertise, product demonstrations, and solution presentations.      Assist in preparing proposals, responses, and contract negotiations to secure new business opportunities.      Conduct product training sessions for sales teams, channel partners, and customers to ensure effective positioning and sales readiness.      5. Customer Engagement and Relationship Management:      Establish strong relationships with key decision-makers, influencers, and stakeholders within target accounts.      Act as a trusted advisor to prospects, offering insights, recommendations, and best practices to address their business challenges.      Gather customer feedback, testimonials, and case studies to showcase successful implementations and drive customer advocacy.        Requirements        Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Engineering, Computer Science, or related field; MBA or equivalent qualification is a plus.      Proven experience( 3-5 years) in pre-sales, solution consulting, or technical sales roles.      Strong understanding of [industry/domain] trends, technologies, and competitive landscape.      Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills.      Demonstrated leadership abilities with a track record of building and managing high-performing teams.      Ability to prioritize and manage multiple initiatives simultaneously in a fast-paced environment.      Results-driven mindset with a focus on exceeding targets and driving business growth

column2: Skills required       :      Microsoft Dynamics 365 or similar CRM/ERP solutions, Strong knowledge of Microsoft Dynamics 365 modules.           Soft Skills       :      Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills & Strong communication and interpersonal skills.           What you will do       :               As a Microsoft Dynamics 365 Presales Executive, you will be responsible for driving sales and revenue growth by providing expert pre-sales support for Microsoft Dynamics 365 solutions. With your extensive knowledge and experience in the field, you will play a critical role in engaging with potential clients, understanding their business requirements, and demonstrating how Microsoft Dynamics 365 can meet their needs.             Key Responsibilities:               Pre-sales Consultation       : Collaborate with the sales team to identify potential customers and engage with them in consultative discussions. Understand their business challenges, processes, and goals to recommend suitable Microsoft Dynamics 365 solutions.           Solution Presentations       : Conduct compelling presentations and demonstrations to showcase the features, functionalities, and benefits of Microsoft Dynamics 365. Tailor the presentations to address the specific requirements of each prospect, highlighting the value proposition and return on investment.           Requirements Analysis       : Analyse customer requirements and develop a deep understanding of their business processes. Translate these requirements into solution designs, mapping the capabilities of Microsoft Dynamics 365 to address customer pain points and achieve their desired outcomes.           Proposal Development       : Collaborate with the sales and technical teams to create comprehensive and persuasive proposals. Clearly articulate the solution architecture, implementation approach, pricing, and value proposition to secure customer buy-in.           Technical Expertise       : Maintain a high level of knowledge and expertise in Microsoft Dynamics 365, including its modules, capabilities, integrations, industry-specific solutions, and latest updates. Stay up to date with industry trends and competitive offerings to effectively position Microsoft Dynamics 365 in the market.           Relationship Building       : Establish and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders within customer organizations, including C-level executives, business owners, IT managers, and end-users. Act as a trusted advisor, understanding their long-term goals and helping them envision how Microsoft Dynamics 365 can drive their digital transformation journey.           Collaboration and Coordination       : Work closely with the sales, marketing, and technical teams to develop and execute sales strategies, campaigns, and initiatives. Provide feedback and insights from customer interactions to contribute to product enhancements and market positioning.               Qualifications      :           Bachelor s degree in business administration, Computer Science, or a related field (MBA preferred).             8+ years of experience in presales or solution consulting roles, with a focus on Microsoft Dynamics 365 or similar CRM/ERP solutions.             Strong knowledge of Microsoft Dynamics 365 modules, including Sales, Customer Service, Field Service, Marketing, Finance and Operations, and Power Platform.             Proven track record of successfully delivering complex presales engagements and driving revenue growth.             Excellent presentation, communication, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage with stakeholders at all levels of an organization.             Analytical mindset with the ability to understand customer requirements and translate them into technical solutions.             Strong business acumen and industry knowledge, with the ability to align Microsoft Dynamics 365 solutions with customer business objectives.             Self-motivated and results-oriented, with the ability to work independently and as part of a team.             Microsoft certifications in Dynamics 365 are highly desirable.
column11: Solution architecture, ERP, Analytical, Relationship building, Presales, Customer service, Service marketing, Microsoft Dynamics, Information technology, CRM

column2: Position Name: Senior Associate  Pre-sales Location: Navi Mumbai Position Overview: We are looking for skilled and enthusiastic Presales Associates to join our team. You will play a pivotal role in supporting the sales team by providing technical expertise, product knowledge, and comprehensive solutions to potential customers. Your primary objective will be to understand the customer's needs, demonstrate the value of our products or services, and assist in closing deals effectively. Responsibilities: Technical Consultation: Collaborate with the sales team and engage with potential clients to understand their requirements, challenges, and objectives. Provide technical guidance and solutions that align with the client's needs and demonstrating how our products/services address their pain points. Product Demonstrations: Conduct product demonstrations and presentations to showcase the features, functionalities, and benefits of our offerings. Customize demonstrations to suit each customer's unique use cases and industry requirements. RFP/RFI Responses: Lead the preparation of responses to Requests for Proposal (RFPs) and Requests for Information (RFIs). Ensure that all technical aspects of the proposal are addressed accurately and professionally. Competitive Analysis: Keep abreast of industry trends and competitors' offerings. Conduct competitive analysis to highlight our strengths and differentiate our products/services from competitors. Customer Relationship Building: Build strong relationships with potential customers during the pre-sales process. Understand their pain points and objectives thoroughly, ensuring that proposed solutions align with their long-term goals. Collaboration: Collaborate closely with the sales team, product managers, and subject matter experts to ensure a smooth transition from presales to the sales closure process. Continuous Learning: Stay up to date with product enhancements, industry trends, and emerging technologies to maintain a deep understanding of our products and the markets we serve. Candidate Skills (must have) BE/B Tech in any branch. Proven experience in presales and technical sales of software solutions. Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to articulate complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to understand customer needs and propose effective solutions. In-depth knowledge of the company's products/services and the ability to relate them to customer requirements effectively. Familiarity with various industries and the ability to adapt solutions to different use cases. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, manage multiple opportunities simultaneously, and meet tight deadlines. Proficiency in using collaboration tools, CRM systems, and sales enablement platforms.
column11: Lead Generation, Technical Sales, Presales, It Solution Sales, RFI, It Services Sales, It Product Sales, RFP, Crm Software
